0: assert is_isogram('Dermatoglyphics') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('Dermatoglyphics') to return True, but got {is_isogram('Dermatoglyphics')}"
assert is_isogram('abcdefg') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('abcdefg') to return True, but got {is_isogram('abcdefg')}"
assert is_isogram('isogram') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('isogram') to return False, but got {is_isogram('isogram')}"
assert is_isogram('subdermatoglyphic') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('subdermatoglyphic') to return True, but got {is_isogram('subdermatoglyphic')}"
1: assert is_isogram('All isograms are isograms') == False
assert is_isogram('The eyes') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('The eyes') to return True, but got {is_isogram('The eyes')}"
assert is_isogram('hello') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('hello') to return False, but got {is_isogram('hello')}"
assert is_isogram('Abba') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('Abba') to return False, but got {is_isogram('Abba')}"
2: assert is_isogram('The eyes') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('The eyes') to return True, but got {is_isogram('The eyes')}"
assert is_isogram('hello') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('hello') to return False, but got {is_isogram('hello')}"
3: assert is_isogram('Hello World') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('Hello World') to return False, but got {is_isogram('Hello World')}"
assert is_isogram('AbC') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('AbC') to return True, but got {is_isogram('AbC')}"
assert is_isogram('All isograms are isograms') == False
assert is_isogram('abc') == True, f"Expected is_isogram('abc') to return True, but got {is_isogram('abc')}"
assert is_isogram('abcabc') == False, f"Expected is_isogram('abcabc') to return False, but got {is_isogram('abcabc')}"
